scripts.scrape:nh: tsx scripts/nh/fetch-nhpfc.ts && tsx scripts/nh/import-nhpfc-towns.ts && tsx scripts/nh/import-nhpfc-budget.ts && tsx scripts/nh/import-nh-road-miles.ts
scripts.scrape:me: tsx scripts/me/import-me-towns.ts && tsx scripts/me/import-me-population.ts && tsx scripts/me/import-me-road-miles.ts
scripts.scrape:all: npm run scrape:nh && npm run scrape:me
